video.title: Gangsters: America's Most Evil
video.synopsis: Investigate the lives of some of America's most notorious modern criminals, including Dana Bostic, Maria "Chata" Leon, Carlos Lehder and Lisette Lee.

episodes.synopsis: This episode profiles Juan Raul Garza, who made millions running drugs across the gateway bridge linking Mexico and the U.S. in Brownsville, Texas.
episodes.title: The First Kingpin: Juan Raul Garza

episodes.synopsis: This episode profiles president of the Outlaws Motorcycle Club Harry "Taco" Bowman, who ordered kidnappings, firebombings, assaults and murders.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Outlaw: Harry Taco Bowman

episodes.synopsis: Griselda Blanco, "The Godmother," is suspected of of murders while transporting cocaine from Colombia to New York, Miami and Southern California.
episodes.title: The Godmother: Griselda Blanco

episodes.synopsis: This episode profiles Albert "Alpo" Martinez, who became a cocaine king of Harlem in the mid-1980s and later admitted to 14 murders.
episodes.title: The Mayor of Harlem: Alberto Alpo Martinez

episodes.synopsis: This episode profiles Johnny Eng, a onetime informant for the DEA who became one of the most notorious drug traffickers in Manhattan's Chinatown.
episodes.title: Machine Gun Johnny: Johnny Eng

episodes.synopsis: This episode explores the case of Luis Felipe, who, from a prison cell, founded the New York chapter of the Latin Kings street gang.
episodes.title: King Blood: Luis Felipe

episodes.synopsis: This episode follows Anthony Shea, one of the most prolific bank and armored truck robbers, and his "no name" gang out of Charlestown, Massachusetts.
episodes.title: Anthony Shea and the No-Name Gang

episodes.synopsis: This episode spotlights Jemeker Thompson, who rose to the top of the cocaine trade during the peak of the 1980s crack epidemic in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: The Queenpin - Jemeker Thompson

episodes.synopsis: This episode profiles Rosalie Garcia, a heroin ringleader; Beatriz Henao, who led an ecstasy ring; and Sandra Beltran, a Mexican drug cartel leader.
episodes.title: Lethal Beauties:  Beltran, Henao & Garcia

episodes.synopsis: Clarence Heatley and his "Preacher" crew extorted, kidnapped and even killed to gain notoriety on the streets of the Bronx and Harlem.
episodes.title: The Black Hand of Death: Clarence 'Preacher' Heatley

episodes.synopsis: Bartolome Moya and his chief enforcer, Andre Paige, led a deadly narcotics and extortion racket in New York City until the law caught up with them.
episodes.title: The Shadow Kingpin: Bartolome Moya

episodes.synopsis: Lisette Lee, who claimed to be an heiress to the Samsung fortune, lived a mysterious life of luxury until her arrest for drug trafficking in 2010.
episodes.title: The Pot Princess of Beverly Hills: Lisette Lee

episodes.synopsis: Following a deadly brawl between the Hells Angels and the Mongols Motorcycle Club in 2002, Ruben "Doc" Cavazos came to national prominence.
episodes.title: The Mongol Warlord: Ruben 'Doc' Cavazos

episodes.synopsis: When her drug-dealing husband was murdered, Thelma Wright had a choice: Start life over on the straight and narrow or take over the family business.
episodes.title: Philly's Gangster Queen: Thelma Wright

episodes.synopsis: Medellin Cartel member Carlos Lehder revolutionized the cocaine business by taking over an island in the Bahamas and using it as a way station.
episodes.title: The Colombian Rambo: Carlos Lehder

episodes.synopsis: Christopher Coke was the notorious leader of the Shower Posse, an international gang that transported drugs to major U.S. cities.
episodes.title: The Kingston Kingpin: Christopher 'Dudus' Coke

episodes.synopsis: Even though Barry Mills has been in prison most of his life, federal prosecutors say he's responsible for at least 14 murders in the past two decades.
episodes.title: The Baron of Brotherhood: Barry Mills

episodes.synopsis: This episode examines gangland matriarch Maria "Chata" Leon and the criminal underworld created by her murderous brood of gangbanger children.
episodes.title: Mother of the Avenues: Maria 'Chata' Leon

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro Corredor seemed like an average family man residing in the small town of Fairway, Kansas, but he lived a dangerous double life.
episodes.title: Alejandro Corredor

episodes.synopsis: Tied as a boy to heroin kingpin Nicky Barnes, "Pistol Pete" came up in the game, growing up in the Soundview projects of the Bronx.
episodes.title: Sex, Money, Murder, Inc: 'Pistol Pete' Rollack

episodes.synopsis: Salvador Magluta and Augusto Falcon, a pair of powerboat racers in Miami, allegedly moved more illegal narcotics than almost anyone in U.S. history.
episodes.title: Los Muchachos: Augusto Falcon and Salvador Magluta

episodes.synopsis: In a decade-long criminal run, the Cutt Boyz used violence to control the drug trade within the B.W. Cooper Housing Complex in New Orleans.
episodes.title: The Cutt Boyz -- Terrance Benjamin & Derrick Washington

episodes.synopsis: Dana Bostic grew up slinging drugs on the corner in his tough Chicago neighborhood and ended up as a heroin kingpin.
episodes.title: Dana Bostic

episodes.synopsis: In the shadows of a broken city, Quasand Lewis made millions by way of a complex drug-trafficking organization in Detroit.
episodes.title: Quasand Lewis
